title: 求推荐音乐→_→闲的。。。。
author: La057
txt_content:
大家有什么好听的音乐
都来分享下吧~~~

replies.author: 银色十字梦
replies.txt_content:
推荐LZ听Lost Rivers
歌词非常感人

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content:
随便
你想要歌还是纯音乐

replies.author: luojiarui
replies.txt_content:
银色十字梦 发表于 2016-1-29 16:59
推荐LZ听Lost Rivers
歌词非常感人
我日~我手残去QQ搜了一下~感觉精神被污染了~

replies.author: luojiarui
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 luojiarui 于 2016-1-29 17:51 编辑 

Ordinary Human，不错的歌~

replies.author: Shelbyend
replies.txt_content:
你曾这样问过。on my own, Take My Hand ,This is Gonna Hurt.
后三个个歌都比较激

replies.author: Wsbyeah
replies.txt_content:
奇迹再现

另外2l真是丧心病狂啊

replies.author: Donnies_Ming
replies.txt_content:
这个站http://www.poetsofthefall.com/
所有的歌在酷狗上都能找到

replies.author: Cai_Iu
replies.txt_content:
且听风吟-朴树
估计没多少人会喜欢我喜欢的歌
